languages.text: {n}В ноосфере Кьявы Гамма развернулась жестокая схватка. Инфодухи сопротивлялись яростно, но вынуждены были сдавать позиции. Цеха и мануфакторумы получили жестокие раны, но выстояли. Когда битва стихла, Кьява Гамма приступила к медленному и тяжкому исцелению.{/n}

{n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В ноосфере Кьявы Гамма развернулась жестокая схватка. Инфодухи сопротивлялись яростно, но вынуждены были сдавать позиции. Цеха и мануфакторумы получили жестокие раны, но выстояли. Когда битва стихла, Кьява Гамма приступила к медленному и тяжкому исцелению.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A fierce fight had broken out in the noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The info-spirits have put up a violent resistance, but had to give up. The workshops and the manufactories have been severely damaged, but still persevered. When the battle had subsided, Kiava Gamma had started a slow and painful healing process.{/n}

{n}A fierce fight had broken out in the noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The info-spirits have put up a violent resistance, but had to give up. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

languages.text: {n}激烈的战斗在基亚瓦伽马星的通感空间中爆发。数据幽灵们进行了激烈的抵抗，但最终还是被消灭了。尽管车间与制造工厂依然勉强能用，但遭到了严重破坏。如今，战斗已经平息，基亚瓦伽马星开始了缓慢而痛苦的疗愈过程。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}激烈的战斗在基亚瓦伽马星的通感空间中爆发。数据幽灵们进行了激烈的抵抗，但最终还是被消灭了。尽管车间与制造工厂依然勉强能用，但遭到了严重破坏。如今，战斗已经平息，基亚瓦伽马星开始了缓慢而痛苦的疗愈过程。{/n}
{n}激烈的战斗在基亚瓦伽马星的通感空间中爆发。数据幽灵们进行了激烈的抵抗，最终被迫投降。尽管车间与制造工厂受到严重破坏，但依然处于勉强能用的状态。如今，战斗已经平息，基亚瓦伽马星开始了缓慢而痛苦的疗愈过程。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Estalló una lucha encarnizada en la noosfera de Kiava Gamma. Los espíritus de datos opusieron una furiosa resistencia, pero finalmente perdieron terreno. Los talleres y los manufactorums sobrevivieron a costa de grandes daños. Ahora que la batalla ha cesado, Kiava Gamma puede iniciar un lento y doloroso proceso de recuperación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Estalló una lucha encarnizada en la noosfera de Kiava Gamma. Los espíritus de datos opusieron una furiosa resistencia, pero finalmente perdieron terreno. Los talleres y los manufactorums sobrevivieron a costa de grandes daños. Ahora que la batalla ha cesado, Kiava Gamma puede iniciar un lento y doloroso proceso de recuperación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマのヌースフィアで激しい戦いが勃発した。データ精霊たちは激しい抵抗を見せたが、降伏を余儀なくされた。工房や聖工場は甚大な被害を被ったものの、何とか持ちこたえた。現在戦闘が一段落し、キアヴァ・ガンマは徐々にではあるが、痛みを伴う癒しのプロセスに入ることができる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キアヴァ・ガンマのヌースフィアで激しい戦いが勃発した。情報精霊たちは激しい抵抗を見せたが、降伏を余儀なくされた。工房や聖工場は甚大な被害を被ったものの、何とか持ちこたえた。現在戦闘が一段落し、キアヴァ・ガンマは徐々にではあるが、痛みを伴う癒しのプロセスに入ることができる。{/n}
{n}キアヴァ・ガンマのヌースフィアで激しい戦いが勃発した。情報精霊たちは激しい抵抗を見せたが、降伏を余儀なくされた。工房や聖工場は甚大な被害を被ったものの、何とか持ちこたえた。現在戦闘が一段落し、キアヴァ・ガンマは徐々にではあるが、痛みを伴う癒しのプロセスに入ることができる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une lutte féroce s'engage dans la noosphère de Kiava Gamma. Les données-esprits opposent une résistance farouche, mais perdent rapidement du terrain. Les ateliers et les manufactorums parviennent malgré tout à maintenir l'activité. Les combats ayant cessé, Kiava Gamma peut entamer un lent et douloureux processus de guérison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lutte féroce s'engage dans la noosphère de Kiava Gamma. Les données-esprits opposent une résistance farouche, mais perdent rapidement du terrain. Les ateliers et les manufactorums parviennent malgré tout à maintenir l'activité. Les combats ayant cessé, Kiava Gamma peut entamer un lent et douloureux processus de guérison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In der Noosphäre von Kiava Gamma ist ein erbitterter Kampf ausgebrochen. Die Datengeister haben sich tapfer zur Wehr gesetzt, verloren aber zunehmend an Boden. Die Werkstätten und Manufactorien haben schwer beschädigt überlebt. Nun, da der Kampf sich gelegt hat, kann Kiava Gamma mit dem langen und schmerzlichen Prozess der Heilung beginnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In der Noosphäre von Kiava Gamma ist ein erbitterter Kampf ausgebrochen. Die Datengeister haben sich tapfer zur Wehr gesetzt, verloren aber zunehmend an Boden. Die Werkstätten und Manufactorien haben schwer beschädigt überlebt. Nun, da der Kampf sich gelegt hat, kann Kiava Gamma mit dem langen und schmerzlichen Prozess der Heilung beginnen.{/n}

{n}In der Noosphäre von Kiava Gamma ist ein erbitterter Kampf ausgebrochen. Die Infogeister haben sich tapfer zur Wehr gesetzt, mussten jedoch kapitulieren. Die Werkstätten und die Manufactorien wurden schwer beschädigt, haben aber überdauert. Nun, da der Kampf sich gelegt hat, kann Kiava Gamma mit dem langen und schmerzlichen Prozess der Heilung beginnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Noosfer'de çetin bir muharebe patlak verdi. Veri ruhları, hışımla direnmelerine rağmen yenilgiden kaçınamadı. Atölye ve manufaktorumlar, ağır hasar görmelerine rağmen yıkılmadı. Şimdi muharebenin dinmesiyle Kiava Gama, yavaş ve acılı onarım sürecine nihayet başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fierce fight broke out in the Noosphere of Kiava Gamma. The data-spirits put up a furious resistance but eventually began to lose ground. The workshops and the manufactorums survived at the cost of severe damage. Now that the battle has subsided, Kiava Gamma can start its slow and painful healing process.{/n}
